why am i banned for this? i literally was not being rude to my team at all. if anything they were flaming me for being "unskilled" i had the same amount of deaths as they did they just decided to flame me. so all i did was try to explain to them that i have the same amount of deaths. i dont think this deserves a permanent ban... i didn't even get chat restricted or banned for 2 weeks. i feel like i'm being targeted by riot as i have been permanently banned before and i feel as if my ip is making riot target me and permanently ban me the second i create a new account. i don't feel like this is fair and i want my ban to be revoked. i am trying to make myself a better person and as you can see in this game i was not "toxic" at all i dont think i deserve a PERMANENT ban just because people report me for unskilled. i think that maybe i should get chat restricted for a certain amount of games or something but not a PERMANENT ban... please take this into account riot.. i feel as if i am being targeted and that this isn't fair at all..

replies.body: The bans go by 10 game chat restriction, 25 game chat restriction, 2 week ban, then permanently banned. that means you have been toxic before and you said you were not being rude at all. To my that's pretty toxic and you deserve it.

> [{quoted}](name=ezpenta1234,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=F8p5H6Xu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-16T04:29:31.371+0000)
>
> The bans go by 10 game chat restriction, 25 game chat restriction, 2 week ban, then permanently banned. that means you have been toxic before and you said you were not being rude at all. To my that's pretty toxic and you deserve it.

haven't been 2 week banned on this account and have only been chat restricted for 10 games

You may have 2 more games of chat logs provided in your in-client reform card, which is presented upon logging in. Extreme behavior may result in skipping punishment tiers, and could be present in other matches that were part of this.

If you think nothing you said was toxic, and you've been banned on previous accounts for being what you would have called "toxic", then I'd hate to see what you think being toxic is and I see no problem with your ban.
are you playing the game or writing an essay
